attributes.action: Create laws that force large food corporations to offset 8% of their profits to the people suffering from starvation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is now time for large food companies to pay humanity taxes on their profits to attempt to eradicate starvation in Africa and the Third World.

This humanity fund could only work if the UK and Europe’s Civil Rights Lawyers and Trustees alike were responsible for such a fund being designated on a Pound -for- Pound basis.
